com.miviclin.droidengine2d.gamestate

Class GameStateAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.gamestate.GameState
      • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.gamestate.GameStateAdapter

  • public abstract class GameStateAdapter
extends GameState
    This class provides an empty default implementation of GameState.
    All abstract methods in GameState are implemented in this class and their implementations are empty.
    This class is useful if overwriting all callback methods in GameState is not needed.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameStateAdapter(Game game)
      Creates a new GameStateAdapter.
      GameStateAdapter(GameStateInputManager gameStateInputManager, Game game)
      Creates a new GameStateAdapter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(Graphics g)
      Renders the game objects of this GameState.
      void onActivation()
      This method is called when this GameState is pushed onto the stack of active GameStates of the GameStateManager.
      void onDeactivation()
      This method is called when this GameState is popped off the stack of active GameStates of the GameStateManager.
      void onDispose()
      All resources should be released in this method.
      void onPause()
      This method is called when GameStateManager.pause() is called, if this GameState is in the stack of active GameStates of the GameStateManager.
      void onRegister()
      This method is called when this GameState is registered in the GameStateManager.
      void onResume()
      This method is called when GameStateManager.resume() is called, if this GameState is the stack of active GameStates of the GameStateManager.
      void update(float delta)
      Updates this GameState.

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Description copied from class: GameState
        Updates this GameState.
        This method is called from GameStateManager.update(float) if this GameState is registered in the GameStateManager.
        Specified by:
        update in class GameState
        Parameters:
        delta - Elapsed time, in milliseconds, since the last update.

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: GameState
        Renders the game objects of this GameState.
        This method is called from GameStateManager.draw(Graphics) if this GameState is registered in the GameStateManager.
        This method is called from the redering thread after GameState.update(float) has been executed in the game thread.
        Specified by:
        draw in class GameState
